data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oliveira, Caroline Silva Neubern De, Silva, Fabio Laurindo Da (2011): Two new species of Larsia Fittkau, 1962 (Diptera: Chironomidae: Tanypodinae) from Neotropical Region, with a checklist of Larsia species of the world. Zootaxa 2786: 27-41, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.205586
